name: Pleural N
title: Clinical and Pathological N
notes:
**Note 1:** Regional nodes are the intrathoracic, internal mammary, peridiaphragmatic, scalene, and supraclavicular nodes. 

**Note 2:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in distant metastasis.
rows: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed
